name: Clear Channel Outdoor Holdings, Inc.
description: Clear Channel Outdoor Holdings, Inc. is a leading global outdoor advertising company, specializing in creating and delivering impactful advertising solutions across a variety of platforms. Founded in 1901, the company has grown to become one of the largest outdoor advertising firms in the world, with a vast network of billboards and digital displays that reach audiences in urban and suburban markets. Clear Channel Outdoor operates in two main segments: Americas and International, providing a diverse range of outdoor advertising options including billboards, street furniture, transit, and airport advertising. The company leverages advanced technology and data analytics to optimize marketing campaigns, ensuring that advertisers can effectively engage with their target audiences. As a pioneer in the digital outdoor advertising space, Clear Channel Outdoor continues to innovate with digital billboards and programmatic advertising, enhancing the effectiveness and efficiency of ad placements. With a commitment to sustainability, the company also seeks to minimize its environmental impact by adopting eco-friendly practices in its operations. Clear Channel Outdoor is dedicated to providing innovative advertising solutions that connect brands with consumers in meaningful ways.
